medium: Watercolor, gouache and gum arabic on paper
provenance: George Schlotel, the sale of his Estate, Christie's, 25th April, 1885, lot 30, bt. Vokins (£157/10/-); S.E. Kennedy, his sale, Christie's, 15th December, 1916, lot 39, bt. Hawarth (14 gns.). (Sandorval and Co., New York); sold to MIA, 1991.
title: Still Life with Grapes and a Pomegranate
